title: symmetric crypto algorithms
extract: Symmetric-key algorithm. Symmetric-key algorithms are algorithms for cryptography that use the same cryptographic keys for both encryption of plaintext and decryption of ciphertext. ... The keys, in practice, represent a shared secret between two or more parties that can be used to maintain a private information link.
extract_html: Symmetric-key algorithm. Symmetric-key algorithms are algorithms for cryptography that use the same cryptographic keys for both encryption of plaintext and decryption of ciphertext. ... The keys, in practice, represent a shared secret between two or more parties that can be used to maintain a private information link.
